cleaned_text: Medicina alternativa Vancouver, British Columbia 110 seguidores Leaders in Naturopathic Healthcare. Official Wellness Centre of Ballet BC. Sobre nosotros Integrative is one of the first and most successful multidisciplinary complementary health centres in Vancouver. However, we are in more than name alone. Every patient is unique and between people one treatment may not be effective for the same set diagnoses or symptoms. Our Integrative Naturopath Vancouver office strives to provide the highest level of client service Each of the founders originally began as chiropractors but the need for better integrative tools set them on a quest of discovery, which saw the continued expansion of their knowledge with licenses in Naturopathic Medicine, Traditional Chinese Medicine, Functional Medicine, Acupuncture and Pharmacology. With this knowledge and experience, one single practitioner can use multiple healing frameworks to find the best method to diagnose and treat any ailment a patient may have - be it in the body, mind or spirit. This is the foundation of the Integrative Model. - Sitio web - [https://integrative.ca/](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Fintegrative%2Eca%2F&urlhash=O3UX&trk=about_website) Enlace externo para Integrative Naturopathic Medical Centre - Sector - Medicina alternativa - Tamaño de la empresa - De 11 a 50 empleados - Sede - Vancouver, British Columbia - Tipo - Asociación - Fundación - 1984 - Especialidades - Naturopathic Doctor, Doctor of Traditional Chinese Medicine, Holistic Nutrition, Program, stemcellpreservation y regenerativemedicine Ubicaciones - Principal 1285 West Broadway 730 Vancouver, British Columbia V6H3X8, CA [Cómo llegar](https://www.bing.com/maps?where=1285+West+Broadway+730+Vancouver+V6H3X8+British+Columbia+CA&trk=org-locations_url) Empleados en Integrative Clarisse Musse Administrative Assistant at Integrative Naturopathic Medical Centre - Karen Lam Doctor of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Registered Acupuncturist - Rhiannon Lockhart I help women on a reproductive health journey find balance, the realistic way. - Carol Neurofeedback Trainer, Stress Management Consultant [Ver todos los empleados](https://www.linkedin.com/signup?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww%2Elinkedin%2Ecom%2Fsearch%2Fresults%2Fpeople%2F%3FfacetCurrentCompany%3D%255B18550653%255D&_l=es&trk=public_biz_employees-join) Páginas similares - Upgrade Labs Servicios de bienestar y ejercicio - The Asprey Group Sanidad, bienestar y ejercicio Victoria, BC - Bulletproof Media Servicios de bienestar y ejercicio - Bulletproof 360 Venta minorista Seattle, WA - Dave Asprey Box Servicios de bienestar y ejercicio Kent, Washington - Bulletproof Media Producción multimedia - TrueDark Servicios de bienestar y ejercicio Kent, Washington - CertifiedHealthNut Servicios de bienestar y ejercicio - 40 Years of Zen Formación profesional y coaching Kenmore, Washington - Thorne HealthTech Servicios de bienestar y ejercicio
